answer:
We recommend that you contact your immunization provider to discuss what vaccines are recommended at this time. You should have a copy of your immunization records when you do so. For tips on locating immunization records check here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## We recommend that you contact your immunization provider to discuss what vaccines are recommended at this time.


## You should have a copy of your immunization records when you do so.

For tips on locating immunization records check here.
Immunization Nurse
question: I'm 61 and my 2 adult children are 30 and 28. We never had the chickenpox or measles but did receive 2 booster shots about 40 years ago. Should we get another booster shot now?
question_variation_0: how often should booster shots be taken
question_variation_1: should booster shots be missed when booster shots are missed
question_variation_2: can i get another booster shot when i've never had chickenpox or measles
